title: News from the Hoefler Type Foundry
content:
News from the Hoefler Type Foundry   
   
Eight new typefaces! GOTHAM 2   
   
 Designer Tobias Frere-Jones expands his award-winning Gotham   
 series into new territory with Gotham 2, a collection of eight   
 new styles. From the gossamer Thin and Extra Light to the hardy   
 Black and Ultra -- each in roman and italic -- these new styles   
 add a note of expressiveness to Gotham's rugged versatility.   
   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham)   
   
   
   
Special Offer -- save up to $100 on Gotham   
   
 Now when you order Gotham, Gotham Condensed, or the new Gotham 2,   
 you'll save $69 when ordering any two packages, or $100 when   
 ordering all three!   
   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham)   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/gothamcondensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gothamcondensed)   
   
   
   
Back by popular demand: Hoefler Text & Titling   
   
 Once again, you'll save $100 when ordering Hoefler Text and   
 Hoefler Titling together:   
   
   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertext](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertext)   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertitling](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertitling)   
   
   
   
New for News: Retina Agate   
   
 Our space-saving Retina Agate typeface, originally designed for   
 the stock listings in The Wall Street Journal, is now available   
 for your newspaper:   
   
 [http://www.typography.com/retina](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115102301/http:/www.typography.com/retina)
author: Joe Pemberton
